DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Compare survival patient gemcitabine-refractory , advanced pancreatic adenocarcinoma treat irofulven v fluorouracil . II . Compare objective tumor response rate patient treat regimen . III . Compare clinical benefit regimen measure improvement pain performance status patient . OUTLINE : This randomize , open-label , multicenter study . Patients randomize 2:1 irofulven fluorouracil treatment arm . Arm I : Patients receive irofulven IV 30 minute day 1 15 . Arm II : Patients receive fluorouracil IV continuously day 1-28 . Courses repeat every 28 day . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : Approximately 350 patient ( 233 arm I 117 arm II ) accrue study .
